committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To designate segments of the Colorado River in Utah within Westwater and Cataract Canyons as components of the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
short_title: Colorado River Wild and Scenic River Addition Act of 1990

summary.text: Colorado River Wild and Scenic River Addition Act of 1990 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate certain segments of the Colorado River in Utah as components of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: Colorado River Wild and Scenic River Addition Act of 1990
To designate segments of the Colorado River in Utah within Westwater and Cataract Canyons as components of the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
